buttonDescription: No charges apply during the trial period. You can change or cancel your selected plan at any time.
doesNotHaveAccess: does not provide access to the features on this page. Upgrade your plan now to unlock the features.

archivedData.noArchivedData: You currently have no archived data.
archivedData.dataSummaryTitle: Your subscription has been adjusted to the '{{planName}}' plan.
archivedData.dataSummaryDescription: Certain features of your previous plan exceeded the limits of your current '{{planName}}' plan. As a result, some of your data has been archived to maintain compliance with the plan's features. You can upgrade your subscription at any time to restore access to your archived data and fully manage it again.
